means: 要使颈骨折断似的，非常危险的

sentence.Network_en: Jack drove to Mayfair at breakneck speed.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰克驾车向梅费尔疾驶。

sentence.Network_en: to drive, etc. at breakneck speed
He painted long into the night, at breakneck speed, his depression gradually slipping away.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以惊人的速度画到深夜, 原先沮丧的心情渐渐消失了.

list.abs: the earlier film is noted for its then-novel use of time lapse photographic effects to show the world around the Time Traveller changing at breakneck speed as he travels through time .早期的电影因使用了新颖的间歇性摄影手法而闻名，以极快的速度表现出当时光旅行者穿越时空时，身边的世界的改变。
Do not a nuclear deterrent in a such breakneck phase is quite admirable ., 在这样一个非常危险的阶段不去拥有核威慑力量是相当令人惊异的.
After a decade of breakneck expansion , big retail chains are slamming on the brakes - hard ., 在经过了几十年的疯狂扩张之后 , 大的零售商正在猛地按刹车 - 难啊.
常用英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... AGM:Annual General Meeting 股东年会 breakneck speed 惊人的速度 contrasting idea adj. 不同的.
...行政法这一领域经历了前所未有的发展和扩张，使其从幼年正迅速发展至中年。”[25]英国有人把它形容为“非常危险的速度”（breakneck speed）。英国行政法发展令人震奋，但行政法研究尤其是对司法审查的宪法基础研究却没有跟上潮流，以致约翰·劳斯不.

entry.def: If you say that something happens or travels at breakneck speed, you mean that it happens or travels very fast.

example.ex: Jack drove to Mayfair at breakneck speed.
example.tran: 杰克驾车向梅费尔疾驶。

auth_sentence.content: Human beings change things, and at breakneck speed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Human beings change things, and at breakneck speed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Human beings change things, and at breakneck speed.

auth_sentence.content: Many analysts believe the true pace was even more breakneck.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many analysts believe the true pace was even more breakneck.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many analysts believe the true pace was even more breakneck.

auth_sentence.content: Meanwhile, the economy kept growing, at breakneck speed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Meanwhile, the economy kept growing, at breakneck speed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meanwhile, the economy kept growing, at breakneck speed.
